values:
Its amazing, the bond that me and my sisters have.  I know that everyone has a special bond with their siblings(and if you have siblings and you don't have that bond, you're really missing out) but this is something different.  It can't be described.  Being a triplet has its ups and downs, but I wouldn't have it any other way.  I always forget that other people didn't grow up with two other people always by your side, and to be honest, I can't even really remember a time when we were younger that we weren't together.  It was like your best friend always being there.  We shared everything, toys, clothes, etc.  Its too mind-blowing to try to think of my childhood without 2 other people my exact same age.  

WhileI'm at i, I hsoudl include my brother.  Best big brother triplets could ask for.  My parents did such a good job raising us, that instead ogf him hating us because we got all the attention,(an old lady passed my mom once on the street while she was pushing us in our 3 person stroller and handed my mom a 20 and said god bless, I don't knwo how you do it) he was so proud of us and always helped feed us and play with us.  There are so many videos of him playing with us and giving us rides on the sled around the yard as Jill falls off the back.  He truly was the best we could have ever asked for.

We used to share a room. and Jill had the bed by the door.  As we all know, I have a fear of the dark, so I would always switch beds with her. (mine was inthe far corner) Eventually we got buk beds and Jill was on the top while i ws on the bottom, and I still remember one night Jill tried to kill me.  Somehow during the night she got her foot underneath the railing and lifted it up and it fell off the bed.  Well of course my head is at her feet and right next to the window.  The bar fell down and broke he window.  Yet, somehow, I slept through the whole thing.  I woke up in the morning to a bar in my face.  Months later my dad's side of the family was over and someone slammed the door to our room and the rest of the glass just shattered.  As I look back on it, its hilarious, but really scaryy at the time.  

I'll be teh firstto admit that we never always got along.  I was responsible for Jill getting stiched in her head because I threw a pool stick at her.  I remember one day we beat each other with empty milk gallon jugs my dad was keeping for some reason or another.  We usd to bite each other so as punishment my dad would squirt mustard in our mouths, henace the reason none of us eat mustard.  But I hate everyithn that I ever did with ill intentions toward them.  And I know I'll never get it back, but I don't have to like what I did.  Oh and Jill, sorry about the time that I feel asleep in bed while you were talking to me from the top bunk.

My favorite (not really) day wit Ivy was  the day I made her pass out.  We were play fighting in the kitchen and somehow I got her in a head hold kind of thing, and she was like, I'm getting dizzy, so I let go and she fell to the floor against the fridge.  The she looks up and goes how did I get here?  It was priceless.  My friend Sarah was over, I think we scarred her that day.

We gotto a point where it became fun fighting, something we did, and still do, to pass the time when we're bored.  My favorit passtime I must say.  Ivy and I play it mainly cuz Jill used to get mad too quickly. but pretty much we just annoy the shit out of each other untill one snaps.  Always a good time.  

I never thought I would miss them as much as a do when I went to college.  My thoughts were finally, after 18 years, I can be my own person, and not be known as the Stelzners, or The Stelzner Triplets.  Needless to say, it wasn't as great as I tought it would be.  Its liek I'm alay missing something.  I feel sad if I don't talk to them every day.  

There's just too much to put into words, but I miss them a lot.  You guys are really my biggest influences in life.  Thanks.

Omg haven't updated in ages.  So I was helping Jen with her music theory homework, and I was playing the piano, and I realized hoe much I missed playing that, and music in general.  I'm seriously considering joining the normal band thing and play oboe again.  But listening to the piano made me think of my old piano teacher, Mrs. Lawrence.  I don't even know if she's still alive.  But when I played a note, I could picture her living room/dining room, and the smell of her house.  She was the sweetest lady ever.  How do we lose touch with people like that?  

Roomate's tryingto get me to go to Calico Jacks.

Thinking of changing my major to history.  Its where my passion lies.  But I don't know what to do with it.  I could go to DC and work in the Smithsonian or the National Archives or the like.  I dunno.  I've just always loved it. I want to be that person that yo usee that can pulled facts out of his ass like no one's business.  Facts that no one else even really cares about but would be totally awsome to know.  A whole collection of useless shit.  Unless I became involved in a Davinci Code/Rule of Four/National Treasure like adventure.  :)

Went shopping today and bought a big ring that makes it look like I'm engaged(dont comment on that).  It makes me feel special.  I'd put it up here but I don't understand that stuff.  

Missin DLC and not too pleased about sweating to death on my way to class, but I'm glad I'm back.

Stupid Jill.  List ten fictional characters you would have sex with, then tag five friends. (In no particular order)

Check out hilarious pics in the link in my AIM profile or  here at http://pg.photos.yahoo.com/ph/clrpopcornbags/my_photos.  Good times.  Can't wait to hang out again.  


In another note...here it is!!!

Here's a recap for those who forgot

1. Reply with your name and I will write something about you.
2. I will then tell what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. If I were to apply an o'clock to you, it would be...
4. I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
5. I'll tell you the most memorable moment I've had with you.
6. I will tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll then tell you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. Put this in your journal.

David

2. Don't yell, but The Broken Road by Rascal Flatts.

4. easy-going
5. this question isnt fair, so I'm just going to put my whole life..except for the time I threw the pool stick at you
6. a kitty

Jen (fatass)

1. If I can get along with you, I can get along with anyone.   I miss you!!!!!
2. Bring on the Men  
3. midnight
4. straight-foward
5. again, really difficult....i dunno? the time we got drunk and dscussed international politics??

Alesha

2. Yellow Submarine The Beatles

4. eccentric, in a good way
5. definitely the beach at midnight
6. turtle

4. animated
5. when you would come over and sit on me
6. a bird.. ?

Andy

2. no idea
3. 2:07 pm
4. unique
5. hahahaha, the drawings you woudl make in O-Chem, and all your silly O-Chem jokes.. oh man, i love that
6. allyl  lol
7. Where do you come up with thesethings?


There,I think that's everybody!  Ahead of schedule, too!!!

Ok guys, one of my favorite songs.  Ostertag, this kinda goes out to you cuz it makes me think of you everytime I hear it.

(This is sung by a Japanese lady so that's why the grammar horrible.  Don't yell at me.)


You think ruv sam thing as getting along?
Sometime ruv is right where you hating most.

The more you ruv someone, the more you want to kill them
The more you ruv someone, the more he make you cry
Though you are right for making peace with them and loving, that why you love so strong you like to see him die!
The more you ruv someone, the more he make you crazy
The more you ruv someone, the more you wishing him dead!
Sometimes you look at him and only see fat and lazy
And wanting baseball bat for hitting him on his head
Love (Love) and hate (and hate), they like two brothers, who go on a date (who go on  a what?)
Where one of them goes, other one follows
You be finding love, he also bring sorow
The more you ruv someone, the more you want to kill them
Loving and klling fit like hand in glove
So if a someone you are wanting so to kill him
You go and find him 
And  you get him
And you no kill them
Cuz chances good he is you love.
 

Haha, ok that makes me laugh.





David I swear to have those stupid things out by next Wednesday.



This is wierd for me.  My life actually seems to be going really well.  I have a job that's paying me $15.96/ hr.  Therefore, I actually have money, for which those of you ith me in school last semester understand how great this is (aka my phone call to sister Jill about my pickle and cracker sandwiches).  Or any college kid for that matter.  I'm getting a car (tomorrow!!!!!) that's practically brand new for next to nothing.  Having a car means I can get a job in Orlando, so that's more money.  Work, aside from pay, is fun.  At least the people I work for are.  Can't wait til I can ork with someone who wants to nap in the mornings again, though.  I'm getting stuff together to move into my apartment, with my life partner Jen, which is goign to be sooo much fun.  Hit up the amll yesterday and it seems as though everytihng is on sale, so that made me happy.  However, my boss heard me say I was going to the Victoria's Secret Semi-Annual sale, and goes old on lemme get a visual.   Kinda disturbing but oh well.  Did I mention I'm getting a  car?  It seems too good to be true.  Oh wait, I remember, Still haven't gotten rid of crazy boy.  Don't yell.  Why do I have this feeling that David's prediction is going to come true?  Oh well, not going to let it get me down right now.

OMG I THINK I'M GETTING A CAR!!!!!!!! 99% sure I'm gettign this car!!!!!!  Uber excited!!!  haha and I thoguht I'd never use that phrase.  

Got roommate assignments for Boardwalk.  No guys but the one girl seems cool (Fatass and I stalked her on facebook).  Dunno about that last girl though, she's not on facebook.  

Lots of funny stories to tell from work, but can't think right now.  (haha, I had a fan club on Friday, it was hialrious)

So car.  Only problem is its a manual, so dad finally has to teach me that.  But I can live with that.  So yes Ostertag, that means you won't have to drag my sorry ass everywhere.

I SWEAR I'm getting those stupi hings out, I'm just lazy as Hell, if you haven't already figured that out.

As you can see, I've been very productive lately.  I swear to you that I'm getting that thing out from the earlier post.  

On another note, Ivy and I saw the best bumper sticker the other day:
   Hey W, no one died when Clinton lied.

Had a lot of stuff I wanted to put in here, but never got around to it so now I don't remember any of them.

Oh wow its been a while since I updated.  The questions thing in my last post is gonna take a little while, mainly cuz I feel like I have no time anymore.  Slep work eat sleep work eat....  I hate reptition.  OH well, for $15 an hour I'll de reptition.  :)  

Summer's been pretty good so far.  Rained all this week so of course I got soaked at work.  To help matters it was only like 55 outside.  Joy.  

I miss my Cogsworth!  :(

Hey ya dumb bitch why don't you ever answer my calls!!??  

Ya, nothing else really to say, sorry this had been so boring.


Oh!  JIll Lukac and I bought a hookah!!! Can't wait til it gets here!!  It soo pretty!

OK guys sorry I haven't updated in forever, so this is my consolation.

1. Reply with your name and I will write something about you.
2. I will then tell what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. If I were to apply an o'clock to you, it would be...
4. I will try to name a single word that best describes you.
5. I'll tell you the most memorable moment I've had with you.
6. I will tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll then tell you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. Put this in your journal.

Work started on Tuesday, so I'm lacking in sleep right now.  Haven't slept in 48 hours, but thats ok cuz I went to see Star Wars!!!!  Soooo worth pulling an all nighter!!!!  

I miss Mark form work so much.  We always have so much fun and get paid to do nothing.  Today we got to our town, Glassport, around 8:30 and proptly took a nap til 9:15.  We were supposed to get up at 9, but overslept.  (yes were sleeping on the job) So we were so unenthusiastic to work and almost got nothing done, then ended upi with 99 poles, the same as yesterday, so we figure that we can work from about 9 to 12, get something to eat (like Primantis, mmm I miss that) and go back to work at about 1:40, then leave to go back to the main building at 2:20.  God I love my job.  Sexual innuendos goin everywhere all day and catching up with friends.  Priceless.  What's sad it that the other group thats there is working almost non stop and they do only a little better than us.

Ok the Ivy countdown is almost up, gtg.  Lots of love!!!!!

AFIRMATIVE ACTION LIVES!!!!!!!!!!!

For those of you that don't understand that, I'm talking about my white 93 Dodge Caravan that is fixed!!!!!!  I'm so excited right now and its the only thing that's keeping me up this early.  

Why Affirmative Action you ask?  Well, my sister Ivy decided she wanted to name it the Black Beast, but of course its white.  So when people would ask us why the Black Beast, we said because of affirmative action, and the name just stuck.  

On another note, Penn State was a bust.  This is going to be harder than I thought, because apparantly he's not ready to give up yet.  Oh well, I can't let it get to me.

BBQ at Marty's tonight!!!!  Woo and hoo, going to be some fun times!!!  


Well, I'm out to clean the car.

Haha, fun time tonight.  My friend Marc was really in the mood for Taco Bell, so we drive by at 11:45 and its closed, even though they're not supposed to close until 12.  So Marc is pissed and sits outside the drive thru window for about 5 minutes til this lady comes over and goes, "We're CLOOOOOOOOSED!!!!!"  So Marc, being the in the closet man that he is (not the other guy, and much better Marc) drives over to Wendy's, orders food, starts complaining to Wendy's about Taco Bell, and the shutthe window in his face.  So then he drives back to Taco Bell, waves to the lady inside, and site on the curb outsid and eats his burger.  oh Marc I lvoe you, so overdramatic about everything.  :)  

Other than that I've just been cleaning and bother the family some more, because I know they've missed it sooo much.

went to a physical today.  Let me tell you, I love old doctors feeling my breasts and then giving pee tests.  Highlight of my day.  Woo and Hoo.

The Keys to Your Heart

You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free.
In love, you feel the most alive when your partner is patient and never willing to give up on you.
You'd like to your lover to think you are stylish and alluring.
You would be forced to break up with someone who was emotional, moody, and difficult to please.
Your ideal relationship is open. Both of you can talk about everything... no secrets.
Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment.
You think of marriage as something precious. You'll treasure marriage and treat it as sacred.
In this moment, you think of love as something you thirst for. You'll do anything for love, but you won't fall for it easily.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?
Interesting....

Ok, first of all two more things I miss about PA.  First, holding your breath through a tunnel and 2) the St. John's Church stairs that are on either side of the road.  What's funny about this is that the road it crosses the PA Turnpike, therefore meaning that there is a big cement barrier in the way.  Yet, they never remove them, its kinda neat.  

Random side note, my sister Jill said she doesn't think she van give blood because you have to weigh over 110 and shes not sure if she passes that......I hate skinny people......

Today I passed a cemetery on my way home from DC and I think there was the most amount of people I have ever seen in a cemetery at one time, all visiting the graves of mothers who have passed away.  It just hit me that at some point, that's going to be me.  This goes out to anyone out there who had to do this for Mother's Day, or Father's Day since we're on it.  




When I dream, on my own
I'm alone but I'm ain't lonely
For a dreamer night's the only time of day




So DC was interesting.  Got to see my fatass again, last time til August.  :(   Way too much family time, but now its backt to the Burgh and sharing a room with my sister who is a Nazi and making me clean and unpack.  grrr.  I kinda deserve it though, I was following her around the house about a half a step behind her, and she kept freaking out on me, and yelling at me.  heehee, its so much fun to annoy her, I can't believe I forgot how entertaining it can be.  well im off to bed, night.

Your brain: 100% interpersonal, 40% visual, 160% verbal, and 100% mathematical!
Congratulations on being 400% smart! Actually, on my test, everyone is. The above score breaks down what kind of thinking you most enjoy doing. A score above 100% means you use that kind of thinking more than average, and a score below 100% means you use it less. It says nothing about how good you are at any one, just how interested you are in each, relatively. A substantial difference in scores between two people means, conclusively, that they are different kinds of thinkers.

Matching Summary: Each of us has different tastes. Still, I offer the following advice, which I think is obvious:

  1. Don't date someone if your interpersonal percentages differ by more than 80%.
  2. Don't be friends with someone if your verbal percentages differ by more than 100%.
  3. Don't have sex with someone if their math percentage is over 200%.



My test tracked 4 variables How you compared to other people your age and gender:
You scored higher than 82% on interpersonal
 You scored higher than 51% on visual
 You scored higher than 96% on verbal
 You scored higher than 71% on mathematical
Link: The 4-Variable IQ Test written by chriscoyne on Ok Cupid

So I'm home in the Burgh.  Its been good so far, so weird to see everything again.  The roads being shitty, PA licence plate everywhere, mountains again..its the little things, ya know?  Like the faucet in the bathroom, I turned it without a second thought, but did a double take when it wasn't what I've grown accustomed to.  Family's great, missed them terribly, and JILL'S WEARING MAKEUP AND CONTACTS!!!! I swear I almost had a heart attack.  My room is almost unrecognizable as my brother and sister in law have been living in there.  But, I can't be mad, Nate just cracked my back.  :)  My parent somehow fit a double bed in Ivy's room, so I get the pleasure of sharing a room with e all summer.  Oh well, if I can handle Fatass, I can handle anything.

Ya know, its wierd.  We all have friends that we claim to know, and yet on a 2 hour plane ride, I heard more about this little old lady's life than I'm almost positive i know about some people I call close friends.  Why is it that everyone feels the need to tell their story during a plane ride?  Maybe its because no one knows what will happen to them when they step onto that plane, so on the off chance that you don't survive, someone can sit there and say, ya know, I only knew them for an hour, but they led a good life.  You find out so many things about a person when you just sit down and talk with them.  Like Clair, who's friends live in Corapolis, Pa, so she's visiting them.  And her one girlfriend who was just admitted to a nursing home.  And how she had colon cancer, and was bedridden for almost a year, so she's trying to get out and around to see everybody.  I think I liked her so much because she reminded me of my nana.  I just love the atmosphere on a plane ride, everyone saying where they're going and where they've been.  Its an experience.

No I don't even know you, but I sure as hell would like to, if you'd give me the chance.

So my room is almost done being packed up.  Its days like these I wish I was Harry Potter.  One swish and flick and my room is all packed and all my stuff is home. Oh well, we can't all be so lucky.  

So party at Peter's last night was a lot of fun, I'm going to miss you guys soo much over the summer!!  

I don;t want to go home at all.  Yes, I want to see my family and friends and miss them terribly, but after about 2 weeks, I'll be ready to come back to O-Town.  I just know that so many things are going to be different, and I don't really want to be a part of it.  I don't think that a lot of my friends from high school have changed and matured as much as I have this past year, and I don't want to go home and be thrown back into that drama again.  It will be so much fun to see them and hang out again, but at the same time, there will be this feeling of distance.  Plus, no one to party with back home. :(  At that rate, I'll be as much as a lightweight as Ostertag is now.  ;-)  However, I am excited to go to DC and see my favorite guy there, Kenneth!!!!!  Don't let me down, Ken.  ;-)  

Well, at any rate, it will be good to se my Duquesne Light friends again, and make lots of money doing nothing!!

Everyone should have a pocket sized gay man.  At least the women. Love is a many splendid thing, love lifts you up where you belong, all you need is love. Please dont start that again. All you need is love. A girl has got to eat. All you need is love. She'll end up on the street. All you need is love. Love is just a game. I was made for loving you baby, you were made for loving me. The only way of loving me baby is to pay a lovely fee. Just one night, give me just one night. There's no way, cuz you can't pay. In the name of love, one night in the name of love. You crazy fool, I won't give in to you. Dont'...leave me this way. I can't survive, without your sweet love, oh baby. Don't leave me this way. You think that people would've had enough of silly love songs. I look around me and I see it isn't so, oh no. Some people want to fill the world, with silly love songs. Well what's wrong with that, I'd like to know, cuz here I go, again. Love lifts us up where we belong. Where eagles fly, on a mountain high. Love makes us act like we are fools, throw our lives away for one, happy day. WE COULD BE HEROES, JUST FOR ONE DAY. You, you will be mean. No I won't. And I... I'll drink all the time. We should be lovers. We can't do that. We should be lovers and that's a fact. Though nothing will keep us together. We could steal time, just for one day. We could be heroes, forever and ever. We could be heroes, forever and ever. We could be heroes, just because I will always love you. I can't help loving you. How wonderful life is, now you're in the world. So many things to say, yet no words to say them.

So if you don't know who my title is talking about, its my Comp 2 teacher,and she's a bitch.  I'm sorry, but I hate this class with a passion.  Why did I take the class with her again?  I'm an idiot.  12 page paper due by Friday, and I'm so screwed for it.  Now apparantly, our final project is due Wed.  So nice that she tells us these things in advance.  'owrihgdfkm,j;oitrhjgiaughj340q6u3eirjdfkvz.fvbhe;kfjzd;sedfjbghoeighfjdsl;giutjfd  That's how my brain feels right now. Oh, and I rolled out of bed today at the last minute hoping to go to my first class then go back to sleep, but noooo, she decides at 10 last night to change her mind and have class today, so here I am wasting valuable napping time.  Ok, I think that's the end of my rant.


On a happier note, retreat this weekend was a lot of fun!!!  Thanks to Jen for getting everything together, we really do appreciate it!  Good times, but nothing really to put down, other than nyham nyham nyham nyham nyham!!!!!  lol  

Yesterday was long.  Got back from retreat, then David and I went to the batting cages, came back, showered (yet my hair still smeels like campfire), then off to the APhiO elections meeting.  Kudos to Jackie for bringing food!!!!  Left for softball game, but even though we lost it was a blast.  The guys on that team are so much fun, and I guarantee that no other team had as much fun as we did, unless you like the whole winning games thing.  Sorry I couldn't get the Spiderman move down.  Elections lasted til about 930, at which point I felt kinda sick from not eating.  So we went to eat and didn't get back home til around midnight.  Still soo tired from retreat, but that's ok.  Oh wait, no its not, I got jipped out of my nap today.  Damnit.

Ok, off to find my friends for lunch!!

My back really hurts, who wants to give Heather a massage!!!!!

there's a lot i want to say, but i have no idea how to say it.  

did you ever get that feeling like no matter what you try to do with yourself, nothing changes?

i dunno, more later

so have you ever really sat down and thought about it?  if the world were to embrace clear popcorn bags, everyone would be a little bit happier.  no more burnt popcorn!!  im telling you, this is it.  i could be rich, too.  oh well, just a thought.

yes, so i finally cracked and got a live journal.  i blame david for that.  just what i need, one more thing to take up my time.  at least now i have somewhere to vent all my thoughts as i sit in my dorm by myself with no tv.  :(  what a sad life, and with only jen as a friend.  i swear to god if i wake up 30 years from now and jens face is still the first thing i see im jumping off a cliff.  you may laugh now, but remember this.  

what we do in life echoes in eternity........how loud will your echo be?
